text: goal libminer provide overview R library set . toy package created part workship meant serious use!

title: Explore Your R Libraries

title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages libraries, optionally total size, use lib_summary().
code: library(libminer) ## basic example code lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                       Library #> 1                                          C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.0/library #> 2 C:/Users/posituser/AppData/Local/Temp/2/Rtmp4aHvn7/temp_libpath1804186a2cbc #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1        400 825597505 #> 2          1     13361

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provides brief summary package libraries machine.

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logical value indicating whether calculate sizes. Default FALSE.

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. sizes = TRUE, column library sizes added.

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72701206 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
